body: Virginia, The plant details really are not working at the moment (hence, their placement in WIP) and I imagine that connecting them to the systems component could be the cause of the error.  I would just remove the plant details and the airside details since PTHP doesn't have any air or water loops anyway.  I was able to run the PTHP system fine on my machine: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/N82BGgaL3u3*UYw-zIjyezF410yx2dvrqAvvHNw9rNFArkQaYo1pBtIFo*xdtGlcRh9Y3TuZJFqf80EbHXtK3U3ojK2PwUHL/PTHP.JPG) I'm using OpenStudio 1.10.0 and I venture our differences in versions could be another possible explanation.  If you upload your GH file, we can find out for sure. -Chris
